Name: Omega Reaction
About the game: Fend off wave after wave of enemies as you fight to victory in this twin stick shooter. Fast shooting guns, plus your ship's additional powerful capabilities help you fight through progressively more difficult levels, in order to escape and make your way home. Controls: WASD + Mouse Optional touch screen controls Xbox 360 controller supported on PC
